titles.title: GAAP Act
Generally Accepted Accounting Principles Act
GAAP Act
To amend title 31, United States Code, to require the President to submit with the budget an estimate of the deficit using generally accepted accounting principles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

bill.summary: Generally Accepted Accounting Principles Act or GAAP Act - Requires the President's budget submission to include an estimate of the deficit or surplus for the fiscal year concerned, prepared using generally accepted accounting principles.
